TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division C Regional 2
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.21.cipherString: The circumstances surrounding your birth is not as important as the opportunity to live life.
CIPHER.21.question: A quote by Lailah Gifty Akita has been encoded as an Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What did they say?
CIPHER.21.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

CIPHER.32.cipherString: A man must take himself for better, for worse, as his portion.
CIPHER.32.question: A quote by Emerson has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with A MAN M.
CIPHER.32.author: Emerson

CIPHER.38.cipherString: La verdadera dificultad del vulcanismo no es ver cómo puede comenzar, sino cómo puede detenerse.
CIPHER.38.question: A quote by Harold Jeffreys has been translated into Spanish and encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher using an English keyword.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.38.author: Harold Jeffreys
CIPHER.38.translation: The real difficulty about volcanism is not to see how it can start, but how it can stop.

CIPHER.24.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 0858 14 28359. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.27.cipherString: Classical quotation is the parole of literary men all over the world.
CIPHER.27.question: The following quote by Samuel Johnson needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of READ
CIPHER.27.author: Samuel Johnson

CIPHER.31.cipherString: Every joy that comes to us is only to strengthen us for some greater labor that is to succeed.
CIPHER.31.question: Some good advice by Fichte has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  What did they say?
CIPHER.31.author: Fichte

CIPHER.34.cipherString: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
CIPHER.34.question: The following text is a Baconian cipher of a quote by Aristotle.  What did they say?
CIPHER.34.author: Aristotle

CIPHER.29.cipherString: Success is not guaranteed, but neither is failure. Take a chance and see where it leads you.
CIPHER.29.question: The following quote by Pep Talk Radio needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of LIFE and polybius key of BRIGHTENS.
CIPHER.29.author: Pep Talk Radio

CIPHER.39.cipherString: I poured root beer into a square glass. Now I just have beer.
CIPHER.39.question: A humorous observation has been encoded as a Complete Columnar Cipher.  The word SQUARE appear in the plaintext.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.39.author: PM_ME_TINY_DINOSAURS.

CIPHER.37.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 640310671 8529. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.28.cipherString: People tend to complicate their own lives, as if living weren't already complicated enough.
CIPHER.28.question: A quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher with a K3 Key phrase.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode the cipher?
CIPHER.28.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

CIPHER.25.cipherString: Boldness is an ill keeper of promise.
CIPHER.25.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Francis Bacon using a cipher they invented.  You are told that the deciphered text starts with BOLD
CIPHER.25.author: Francis Bacon (Baron Verulam and Viscount St Albans) 1561-1626

CIPHER.26.cipherString: Eye wan two bee sumthign really skary four Halloween this year so eye am dresing up as a fone batery at too per sent
CIPHER.26.question: A friend of yours who doesn't type very well encoded a message to you as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.36.cipherString: Knowledge is boundless; human capacity limited.
CIPHER.36.question: The following symbols are a Baconian encoding of a quote by Chamfort.  What did they say?
CIPHER.36.author: Chamfort.

CIPHER.40.cipherString: Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
CIPHER.40.question: A quote by David Hilbert has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the word GAME appears in the quote.  What did they say?
CIPHER.40.author: David Hilbert

CIPHER.22.cipherString: Knowledge and timber should not be much used until they are seasoned.
CIPHER.22.question: The following quote by Holmes needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of READ and polybius key of SEARCHING.
CIPHER.22.author: Holmes.

CIPHER.33.cipherString: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
CIPHER.33.question: A quote by Thomas A. Edison has been encoded using an Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What did they say?
CIPHER.33.author: Thomas A. Edison

CIPHER.35.question: Decode the following Italian Proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of JUMP.
CIPHER.35.author: Italian Proverb

CIPHER.23.cipherString: It is only the finite that has wrought and suffered; the infinite lies stretched in smiling repose.
CIPHER.23.question: A quote by Emerson has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the word THE appears twice in the decoded text.
CIPHER.23.author: Emerson.

CIPHER.30.cipherString: I've got to keep breathing. It'll be my worst business mistake if I don't.
CIPHER.30.question: Decode this quote by Steve Martin encoded as a Complete Columnar cipher which has the word KEEP in it somewhere.
CIPHER.30.author: Steve Martin

CIPHER.146.cipherString: Yes, vanity is a weakness indeed. But pride - where there is a real superiority of mind, pride will be always under good regulation.
CIPHER.146.question: A quote by Jane Austen has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter U decodes to T.
CIPHER.146.author: Jane Austen
